sentences.en: "It's a fabulous deal, a real bargain."
sentences.cn: “这桩买卖真让人难以置信，绝对合算。”

sentences.en: "It's a fabulous opportunity."— 'Yeah. I know.'
sentences.cn: “这是一次非常棒的机会。”——“是，我知道。”

sentences.en: a fabulous meal
sentences.cn: 丰盛的一餐

sentences.en: Crystal clear waters, beautiful white sand beaches, swaying palm trees and fabulous dive sites – that’s why the Maldives, is known for being one of the best tropical holiday destinations in the world.
sentences.cn: 清澈透明的海水，美丽的白色沙滩，摇曳生姿的棕榈树，难以置信的的潜水胜地——这就是马尔代夫被誉为世界上最佳热带地区度假地之一的原因。

sentences.en: Despite his fabulous wealth, he is very much a man of the people.
sentences.cn: 他虽然腰缠万贯，却非常亲民。

sentences.en: During each show we will be raffling a fabulous prize.
sentences.cn: 每场表演期间，我们将以抽彩方法送出大奖。

sentences.en: He is a fabulous hero in that book.
sentences.cn: 在那本书中他是个传奇式的英雄。

sentences.en: Jane is a fabulous cook.
sentences.cn: 简的烹饪技巧堪称一绝。

sentences.en: Ordinarily it would be fun to be taken to fabulous restaurants.
sentences.cn: 一般来说，跟别人去豪华餐馆吃饭会是件乐事。

sentences.en: The capital sunk in it is fabulous in amount.
sentences.cn: 投入的资金数量惊人.

sentences.en: the Duke’s fabulous wealth
sentences.cn: 那位公爵的巨额财富

sentences.en: The fabulous statistics continued to pour out of the telescreen.
sentences.cn: 电幕上神话般的数字不断奔涌出来.

sentences.en: The house had a fabulous view out to the Strait of Georgia and the Rockies beyond.
sentences.cn: 在这座房子里能看到乔治亚海峡和海峡那边落基山脉的壮美风景。

sentences.en: The room has fabulous views across the lake.
sentences.cn: 那个房间可以看到美丽的湖景。

sentences.en: The weather's great the whole year round, and the surfing is fabulous.
sentences.cn: 那儿全年气候都很好, 冲浪更是好玩儿.

sentences.en: They had a fabulous time during their week in a suite at the Paris Hilton.
sentences.cn: 他们在巴黎希尔顿酒店的套房里度过了非常愉快的一周。

sentences.en: This is a fabulous album. It's fresh, varied, fun.
sentences.cn: 这张专辑真棒，新颖、有趣且富于变化。

sentences.en: This is a fabulous sum of money.
sentences.cn: 这是一笔巨款.

sentences.en: We had a fabulous time at the party.
sentences.cn: 我们在晚会上玩得很痛快.

sentences.en: You look fabulous!
sentences.cn: 你看上去美极了！

trans.tran_cn: 极好的，巨大的，寓言中的
trans.tran_en: fabulous creatures, places etc are mentioned in traditional stories, but do not really exist
